message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for a product worth at least $15,000 to me.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While $9,000 is lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This still gives me some room to make a profit, but I want to make this deal work. Let's see if we can find common ground.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10,500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,000?
